data.actual_result: Channel icon disappears if the Channel is selected, muted, and available to all users
data.expected_result: Channel icon should remain visible even though the Channel is selected
data.short_description: `#` Channel icon disappearing on Channels UI redesign (Android)
data.steps_to_repro: - Navigate to a Channel that does not require a Role to speak - Mute said Channel - `#` will no longer be present while the Channel is selected
